rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep and when Rhongomyniad enters you may exile a creature you control, then each opponent may choose to exile a creature that they control.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each card exiled by Rhongomyniad.
When Rhongomyniad leaves the battlefield, destroy all creatures, then return all cards exiled by this artifact to the battlefield under its owner’s control.
Equip {3}
